title: There's a Lot to Unpack in Katy Perry's New "Chained to the Rhythm" Music Video Teaser - Katy Perry Post "Chained to the Rhythm" Video Teaser on Instagram
text:
There's a Lot to Unpack in Katy Perry's New "Chained to the Rhythm" Music Video Teaser 
Well, *this* should be interesting. Getty By Kayleigh Roberts Feb 18, 2017 Katy Perry's new single, "Chained to the Rhythm," is exactly what we needed for 2017. The song might sound upbeat and easygoing, but the lyrics send a powerful message about the dangers of complacency, which is scarily relevant today. When Perry dropped the single, along with an adorable lyric video of a hamster eating teeny tiny food, we were in. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Now, she's teasing the full music video for the song and it looks very interesting. The setting is a creepy amusement park called Oblivia, with rides like "The Wheel" and "The American Dream Drop." Basically, in case you missed the political undertones of the song, Perry is prepared to slap you in the face with them in the video. A post shared by KATY PERRY (@katyperry) on Feb 17, 2017 at 7:26pm PST The full video will be released Tuesday, and honestly, we can't wait.
